name: Barrier (Senka)
description:
Barrier is a 2D platform game in which you have to learn languages in order to advance. The game was made specifically for the game jam "UoM Gamejam" for a limited amount of time. The game is now quite raw since I made it alone in just 2 days, so I will be glad if you share the bugs or improvements found.

Platforms: Windows

Gameplay duration: ~5-10 minutes

WARNING SPOILERS/CHEATS/PUZZLE SOLUTIONS:

1 Puzzle: 10

2 Puzzle: 25

3 Puzzle: 1627

4 Puzzle: green

5 Puzzle: yellow

6 Puzzle: wmrmbc

7 Puzzle: flying

8 Puzzle: b
